name: Balloon Brawlers
description:
A small pvp game for up to 4 players.

Starting game with 1 player:
Enter single player balloon popping chalange. Pop all ballons in the stage to advance.

Starting game with 2 - 4 plauers:
Pop other player's balloons and then knock them out before they manage to refill new one. Collect items and use the environmet to gain advantage.
Be the last one standing to gain a point. Collect 10 points to win.
Each round is played on one of 70 different maps.

If you found any bug of have a suggetion feel free to comment
